00178    MeanSqDispArray<Data>::MeanSqDispArray() 
00179     : buffers_(),
00180       sqDiffSums_(),
00181       nValues_(),
00182       ensembleCapacity_(0),

00195    /*
00196    * Read parameters from file.
00197    */
00198    template <typename Data>
00199    void MeanSqDispArray<Data>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00200    {
00201       readBegin(in, "MeanSqDisp");
00202 
00203       read<int>(in, "ensembleCapacity", ensembleCapacity_);
00204       read<int>(in, "bufferCapacity", bufferCapacity_);
00205       allocate();
00206       nEnsemble_ = ensembleCapacity_;
00207 
00208       readEnd(in);
00209    }
00210    
00211    /*
00212    * Set parameters and initialize.
00213    */
00214    template <typename Data> 
00215    void 
00216    MeanSqDispArray<Data>::setParam(int ensembleCapacity, int bufferCapacity)
00217    {
00218       // Set capacities and allocate
00219       ensembleCapacity_ = ensembleCapacity;
00220       bufferCapacity_   = bufferCapacity;
00221       allocate();
00222 
00223       // Set actual number of sequences to maximum capacity as a default.
00224       nEnsemble_        = ensembleCapacity;
00225    }
00226 
00227    /*
00228    * Set or reset nEnsemble.
00229    */
00230    template <typename Data>
00231    void MeanSqDispArray<Data>::setNEnsemble(int nEnsemble)
00232    {
00233       // Preconditions
00234       if (ensembleCapacity_ == 0) 
00235          UTIL_THROW("No memory has been allocated: ensembleCapacity_ == 0"); 
00236       if (nEnsemble > ensembleCapacity_) 
00237          UTIL_THROW("nEnsemble > ensembleCapacity_");
00238 
00239       nEnsemble_ = nEnsemble;
00240    }
00241 
00242    
00243    /* 
00244    * Set previously allocated to initial empty state.
00245    */
00246    template <typename Data>
00247    void MeanSqDispArray<Data>::clear()
00248    {   
00249       nSample_ = 0;
00250 
00251       if (bufferCapacity_ > 0) {
00252 
00253          int i;
00254          for (i = 0; i < bufferCapacity_; ++i) {
00255             setToZero(sqDiffSums_[i]);
00256             nValues_[i] = 0;
00257          }
00258    
00259          for (i = 0; i < ensembleCapacity_; ++i) {
00260             buffers_[i].clear();
00261          }
00262 
00263       }
00264 
00265    }
00266    
00267    /*
00268    * Allocate arrays and an array of CyclicBuffer objects (private method).
00269    */
00270    template <typename Data>
00271    void MeanSqDispArray<Data>::allocate()
00272    { 
00273       if (bufferCapacity_ > 0) { 
00274  
00275          // Allocate accumulator arrays
00276          sqDiffSums_.allocate(bufferCapacity_);
00277          nValues_.allocate(bufferCapacity_);
00278    
00279          // Allocate buffers
00280          buffers_.allocate(ensembleCapacity_);
00281          for (int i=0; i < ensembleCapacity_; ++i) {
00282             buffers_[i].allocate(bufferCapacity_);
00283          }
00284 
00285       }
00286       clear();
00287    }
00288    
00289    /*
00290    * Sample a single value from a time sequence.
00291    */
00292    template <typename Data>
00293    inline void MeanSqDispArray<Data>::sample(const Array<Data>& values)
00294    {
00295       int i, j;
00296 
00297       ++nSample_;
00298 
00299       for (i = 0; i < nEnsemble_; ++i) {
00300          buffers_[i].append(values[i]);
00301       }
00302       
00303       int bufferSize = buffers_[0].size();
00304       for (j = 0; j < bufferSize; ++j) {
00305          for (i = 0; i < nEnsemble_; ++i) {
00306             sqDiffSums_[j] += sqDiff(buffers_[i][j], values[i]);
00307          }
00308          ++nValues_[j];
00309       };
00310    }
00311   
00318    template <>
00319    inline double 
00320    MeanSqDispArray<int>::sqDiff(const int& data1, const int& data2) 
00321    {
00322       int diff; 
00323       diff = data1 - data2;
00324       return double(diff*diff);
00325    }
00326 
00333    template <>
00334    inline double 
00335    MeanSqDispArray<double>::sqDiff(const double& data1, const double& data2) 
00336    {
00337       double diff; 
00338       diff = data1 - data2;
00339       return diff*diff;
00340    }
00341 
00348    template <>
00349    inline double 
00350    MeanSqDispArray<Vector>::sqDiff(const Vector& data1, const Vector& data2) 
00351    {
00352       Vector diff;
00353       diff.subtract(data1, data2);
00354       return diff.square();
00355    }
00356 
00357    /*
00358    * Final output
00359    */
00360    template <typename Data>
00361    void MeanSqDispArray<Data>::output(std::ostream& out) 
00362    {
00363       double msd;
00364    
00365       // Calculate and output mean-squared difference
00366       int bufferSize = buffers_[0].size();
00367       for (int i = 0; i < bufferSize; ++i) {
00368          msd = sqDiffSums_[i]/double(nValues_[i]*nEnsemble_);
00369          out << Int(i) << Dbl(msd) << std::endl;
00370       }
00371       
00372    }
00373    
00374    /*
00375    * Serialize this MeanSqDispArray.
00376    */
00377    template <typename Data>
00378    template <class Archive>
00379    void MeanSqDispArray<Data>::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00380    {
00381       ar &  buffers_; 
00382       ar &  sqDiffSums_;
00383       ar &  nValues_;
00384       ar &  ensembleCapacity_;
00385       ar &  bufferCapacity_;
00386       ar &  nEnsemble_;
00387       ar &  nSample_;
00388    }
